title: 📘 Behind My Blog
paragraphs: I created this page to document every step I’ve taken in building the “Support My Journey” blog – a space where I share my aspirations and hope to receive support from the community.

From learning how to set up a blog, customising the layout, connecting PayPal, and creating a donation button... each stage has been a meaningful experience. I wanted to keep a record of it as a personal reminder and share it with anyone who might be on a similar journey.
milestones: 5 July 2025 – Came up with the idea to create a personal fundraising blog.
5 July 2025 – Created the Blogspot site with the goal of raising funds to purchase equipment, and searched for a suitable theme.
6 July 2025 – Chose the blog name “Support My Journey”.
6 July 2025 – Designed the logo and favicon in blue and white tones.
6 July 2025 – Wrote the first fundraising campaign (Logitech G923).
6 July 2025 – Registered with PayPal and created the donation button.
7 July 2025 – Integrated progress bar, donation history, and transparency policy.
8 July 2025 – Purchased the domain supportmyjourney.com and connected it to Blogspot. Configured DNS (Cloudflare) so Blogspot and email could function properly.
9 July 2025 – Added multilingual support within posts alongside the Google Translate widget; optimised for mobile.
9 July 2025 – Continued refining the multilingual system.
10 July 2025 – Finalised the multilingual system and removed the Google Translate widget due to conflict with the in-post system.
10 July 2025 – Time for a break... I’ll continue updating with automatic donation tracking soon...
footer: Thank you for visiting this page. I hope this little journey offers you some insight or encouragement.
